nodes.name: unlock
revealedAndUnlocked

getSubmarineAmount(bytes32).return: amountRevealed amount promised by user to be unlocked in reveal

getSubmarineCommitBlockNumber(bytes32).return: commitTxBlockNumber block number that the user proved holds the        commit TX.

getSubmarineCommitTxIndex(bytes32).return: commitTxIndex the index in the block where the commit tx is.

params._commitValue: amount of ether supposed to be sent in this submarine       commit
params._embeddedDAppData: optional Data passed embedded within the unlock       tx. Clients can put whatever data they want committed to for their       specific use case
params._gasLimit: the gas limit that will be set in the unlock tx
params._gasPrice: the gas price that will be paid in the unlock tx
params._libsubmarine: address of submarine contract. Usually address(this)
params._user: address of the user that initiated the full submarine flow

getSubmarineState(bytes32).return: amountRevealed amount promised by user to be unlocked in revealamountUnlocked amount actually unlocked by the user at this timecommitTxBlockNumber block number that the user proved holds the        commit TX.commitTxIndex the index in the block where the commit tx is.

reveal(uint32,bytes,bytes32,bytes,bytes).details: warning Must be called within 256 blocks of the commit transaction     to obtain the correct blockhash.

params._commitTxBlockNumber: Number of block in which the commit tx was       included.
params._embeddedDAppData: optional Data passed embedded within the unlock tx. This should probably be null
params._proofBlob: the proof blob that gets passed to proveth to verify       merkle trie inclusion in a prior block.

params._submarineId: committed data; The commit instance representing the       commit/reveal transaction

revealedAndUnlocked(bytes32).return: bool whether the commit has a stored submarine send that has been        completed for it (0 for failure / not yet finished, 1 for        successful submarine TX)

unlock(bytes32).details: warning this function does NO validation whatsoever.     ALL validation is done in the reveal.

params._submarineId: committed data; The commit instance representing the       commit/reveal transaction

getSubmarineAmount(bytes32).notice: Singleton session getter - amount of money sent in submarine send

getSubmarineCommitBlockNumber(bytes32).notice: Singleton session getter - Commit TX Block number

getSubmarineCommitTxIndex(bytes32).notice: Singleton session getter - Commit TX Block index inside block

getSubmarineId(address,address,uint256,b.notice: Helper function to return a submarine ID for associated given        input data

getSubmarineState(bytes32).notice: Return the session information associated with a submarine ID.

reveal(uint32,bytes,bytes32,bytes,bytes).notice: Function called by the user to reveal the session.

revealedAndUnlocked(bytes32).notice: revealedAndUnlocked can be called to determine if a submarine        send transaction has been successfully completed for a given        submarineId

unlock(bytes32).notice: Function called by the submarine address to unlock the session.
